scripts.build: npm run build-debug-js && npm run build-min-js
scripts.safari12: Released in 2018, last OS for iPhone 6 (2014), iPhone 5s (2013).
scripts.safari14: Released in 2020. Includes BigInt, Promise.any, Promise.allSettled, string.matchAll, ??, ??=, ?., WebP images, CSS :is() selector,
scripts.safari14.5: Released in April 2021. Includes CSS inset, CSS gap in flex/flexbox, Weakref, Finalization registry, export * as namespace,
scripts.safari15: Released in 2021, last OS for iPhone 7 (2016), iPhone SE gen 1 (2016), iPhone 6s (2015).
scripts.safari15.4: Released in 2022. Includes Array.at, Object.hasOwn, #private class fields, CSS Cascade layers, CSS Gradients are now premultiplied,
scripts.safari16: Released in 2022. Includes CSS Container Queries (size), CSS Overflow: clip, CSS Subgrid,
scripts.safari16.6: Released in 2023. Includes CSS Nesting, CSS3 Colors, class static init blocks, await in module
scripts.coolstuff: CSS View Transitions API (Chromium only), CSS Subgrid
scripts.bun-build: npm run bun-build-debug-js && npm run bun-build-min-js
